Detailed Description

Provides a divider bar with info tabs as the second widget.

DzInfoDivider places a divider bar between your widget and a tab bar of info tabs. This class is very similar (but not exactly like) DzDynamicDividerWgt. For situations where you want to control both sides of the divider bar it is recommended to use DzDynamicDividerWgt.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzInfoDivider::MinimizedState

Specifies the minimized state for this divider bar

Enumerator:
NotMinimized 

The info tabs are not minimized

HalfMinimized 

The info tabs are visible, but their content is not

FullMinimized 

The info tabs are not visible

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzInfoDivider::DzInfoDivider ( QWidget *  firstWidget,
QWidget *  parent = 0,
const QString &  name = QString::null 
)

Constructor. Creates a new DzInfoDivider object. This object works best if both widgets have an appropriate minimumSizeHint method (reimplemented, if subclassed).

Parameters:
firstWidget The top (or left) widget in relation to the divider bar
parent The parent of this object
name The name of this object

Overrides QWidget::changeEvent() to handle style changes.

Parameters:
event The change event to be processed
void DzInfoDivider::correctDividerPercentage (  )  [protected]

Corrects the divider percentage if the current percentage violates minimum size constraints of one of the widgets on either side of the divider. This method does not normally need to be called manually.

void DzInfoDivider::doBothWidgetHLayout (  )  [protected]

Called by DzInfoDivider::doLayout(). Reorganizes the layout if the orientation of the bar is Vertical. Note: This is not a typo. If the bar is Vertical, the layout is reorganized horizontally from left to right.

void DzInfoDivider::doBothWidgetVLayout (  )  [protected]

Called by DzInfoDivider::doLayout(). Reorganizes the layout if the orientation of the bar is Horizontal. Note: This is not a typo. If the bar is Horizontal, the layout is reorganized vertically from top to bottom.

void DzInfoDivider::doLayout (  )  [protected]

Refreshes the layout of the widgets and the divider bar.

double DzInfoDivider::getActualDividerPercent (  )  [slot]
Returns:
current divider position, or -1 if minimized
DzDividerBar * DzInfoDivider::getDividerBar (  ) 
Returns:
the divider bar used by this instance to allow for more control over its behavior.
DzInfoTabs * DzInfoDivider::getInfoTabs (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
the info tabs for this divider bar. The info divider allows you to display tips, metadata, and other info relating to your product.

void DzInfoDivider::getMinSizes ( QSize &  firstMin,
QSize &  secondMin 
) const [protected]

Sets firstMin and secondMin to the greater of the widgets' minimumSizeHint() and minimumSize() methods. Width and Height are compared separately.

Parameters:
firstMin The minimum size to be used for the first widget
secondMin The minimum size to be used for teh second widget
DzDividerBar::WidgetType DzInfoDivider::getPreferredWidget (  )  const
Returns:
One of three values: DzDividerBar::WTLeftOrTop, DzDividerBar::WTRightOrBottom, or DzDividerBar::WTNone. The value determines which widget getPreferredWidgetExtent() refers to.
int DzInfoDivider::getPreferredWidgetExtent (  ) 
Returns:
The extent for the preferred widget. This value is only used when getPreferredWidget() returns a value other than DzDividerBar::WTNone.
int DzInfoDivider::getToggleState (  )  [slot]

This method is for scripting purposes only. SDK Developers should use DzInfoDivider::toggleState()

Returns:
the minimized (toggled) state as an int.
bool DzInfoDivider::isMinimized (  )  [slot]
Returns:
true if the divider bar is in a minimized state, false otherwise. This method is the same as DzInfoDivider::isToggled()
bool DzInfoDivider::isToggled (  )  [slot]
Returns:
true if the divider bar is in a minimized state, false otherwise. This method is the same as DzInfoDivider::isMinimized()
int DzInfoDivider::margin (  )  [slot]
Returns:
The margin to use around the widgets in this divider bar
QSize DzInfoDivider::minimumSizeHint (  )  const [virtual]

a minimum size for this object based on the margin and spacing settings, the minimumSizeHint() method for the two widgets, and the size of the divider bar.

void DzInfoDivider::moveDivider ( int  distance  )  [slot]

Moves the divider distance pixels from the current location

Parameters:
distance The distance in pixels from the current location. If the new location will cause the divider to be displayed in an invalid location, it will be displayed in the closest location to where it was dragged

void DzInfoDivider::setDividerPercentage ( QSize &  oldSize,
QSize &  newSize 
) [protected]

Sets the new percentage for the divider bar position, taking into account the old size, the new size, and the current StretchType. This does not normally need to be called manually.

void DzInfoDivider::setPreferredDividerPercent ( double  position  )  [slot]

Sets the location of the divider bar

Parameters:

void DzInfoDivider::setPreferredWidgetExtent ( DzDividerBar::WidgetType  widget,
int  extent 
)

Sets the preferred extent (width or height depending on orientation) for the specified widget. If this extent cannot be used (usually due to minimum size constraints) then the divider will be positioned as close as possible to the preferred extent.

Parameters:
widget The widget that should be sized. Values other than DzDividerBar::WTLeftOrTop or DzDividerBar::WTRightOrBottom will cause this method to have no effect.
extent The extent to be set for the widget
void DzInfoDivider::setSpacing ( int  spacing  )  [slot]

Sets the spacing between the widgets and the divider bar

Parameters:
spacing The new spacing
void DzInfoDivider::setToggleDirection ( DzDividerBar::WidgetType  toggleDir  ) 

Sets the direction the divider bar will toggle when clicked

Parameters:
toggleDir The new toggle direction
void DzInfoDivider::setToggleState ( int  state  )  [slot]

Sets the toggled state of this divider bar.

Parameters:
state The new state of this divider bar: 0 = DzInfoDivider::NotMinimized, 1 = DzInfoDivider::HalfMinimized, 2 = DzInfoDivider::FullMinimized. Any other values and this method has no effect.
QSize DzInfoDivider::sizeHint (  )  const [virtual]

the size hint for this divider bar

Returns:
The spacing between the widgets and this divider bar
void DzInfoDivider::toggleClosed (  )  [slot]

Toggles the second widget between fully closed and fully open.

bool DzInfoDivider::toggleEnabled (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if this divider bar can be toggled, false otherwise
void DzInfoDivider::toggleMinimized (  )  [slot]

Toggles the widget specified by a call to enableToggleBar. If toggling is disabled, this method has no effect. If either the first or second widget is null, toggling this method will also have no effect. This may change in a future version

DzInfoDivider::MinimizedState DzInfoDivider::toggleState (  ) 
Returns:
The toggled state of this divider bar
